message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within $10,000. Would you be able to lower the price to $10,000?

Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $10,500. This still reflects the value of the product, and it's a fair compromise. Let me know what you think!
